channel.title: c-lightning on ₿itcoin Transcripts
channel.description: Recent content in c-lightning on ₿itcoin Transcripts

item.title: c-lightning developer call (2021-08-09)
item.description: Name: c-lightning developer call Topic: Various topics Location: Jitsi online Date: August 9th 2021 Video: No video posted online The conversation has been anonymized by default to protect the identities of the participants. Those who have expressed a preference for their comments to be attributed are attributed. If you were a participant and would like your comments to be attributed please get in touch. Individual updates Today I started to review some pull requests.

item.description: Name: c-lightning developer call Topic: Various topics Location: Jitsi online Date: August 23rd 2021 Video: No video posted online The conversation has been anonymized by default to protect the identities of the participants. Those who have expressed a preference for their comments to be attributed are attributed. If you were a participant and would like your comments to be attributed please get in touch. Individual updates I’ve been working on connectd, we got that merged.

item.title: c-lightning developer call (2021-09-06)
item.description: Name: c-lightning developer call Topic: Various topics Location: Jitsi online Date: September 6th 2021 Video: No video posted online The conversation has been anonymized by default to protect the identities of the participants. Those who have expressed a preference for their comments to be attributed are attributed. If you were a participant and would like your comments to be attributed please get in touch. Individual updates I’ve been mostly shepherding the pull requests on c-lightning and looking into issues we need to fix for the coming release.
